page.title: 20 SHOPPING
page.content: Our squares do not contain the principal shopping areas for the people of Barnstaple.There are however two areas of shops where local people buy their daily requirements.There are 55 different shops in Newport,mostly small,selling food and other essentials.Suprisingly there are 5 D.I.Y. shops included in the total. The other area of shops is Bear Street.Here there are 30 shops again mostly small ones.Of these 30 shops,4 sell second_hand furniture.Bear Street is just off Boutport Street which is one of the main shopping streets in Barnstaple.The only other shop in our area is a small hypermarket on the Yeo Valley housing estate.
